message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm hoping to secure this product for a slightly lower price.  I'm prepared to pay $900,000 for it. This would still be a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline your offer at $900,000. We believe the true value of this product is $1,000,000, reflecting its quality and unique features. I am willing to consider a compromise at $975,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're looking for.
